subject: Norms for issuance/providing of printers to the officers at NHAI headquarters
text: 9Trril4 <eq V NTANf wiferarrut 311Y /Phone 91-11.25074100/25074200 (Ma 4aat, 036 Vfart 31< <rrnf 7ATr4) #48 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India QT_ Extn : 2223 2318 2468 2553 (Ministry of Shipping, Road Transport and Highways) 3-5 U 6, #2<-40, &1rwT, #f fcam-110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 No.11041/217/2007-Admn_ 14.07.2009 POLICY MATTERS ADMINISTRATIONIFINANCE (52/2009) (Decision taken on /T Division File No. 11013/101/2009/1T) Sub: Norms for issuancelproviding of printers to the officers at NHAI Headquarters. In order to streamline the system for issuance providing printers to {he officers at Hleadquarters, it has been decided with the approval of the Competent Authority that such facilities shall be granted to the officers at Headquarters as under S Designation of Officers Printer Facility No. (_) Chairman, Members, CGMs and Multi-Function Colour Printers (MFP) with GMs where no CCGM is posted facility to Scan,Fax and Print: (ii) Personal staff of Chairman, Laser Printers Members, CGL GMs and DGMs (iii) GMs, DGMs, Managers Laser Printers Network Printers installed at each floors or (iv) All other officers share the printers with concerned Managers Note: The above norms will be applicable for fresh purchase of printers at NHAI HQs and the existing  printers will  continue to be issued to the officers   allotted presently. 2 relaxation on the above norms shall be provided only with the approval of Member (Admn:) on case to case basis for which the user may forward their request through their respective CGMs to IT division for seeking approval of Member (Admn:) 3_ This issue with the approval of Competent Authority.
